mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_board (title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{regdate}, #{viewcnt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_board SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer}, regdate=#{regdate}, viewcnt=#{viewcnt} WHERE bno=#{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt FROM tbl_board WHERE bno=#{bno}
SELECT bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt FROM tbl_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc
